briefdescription.para: Macro for getting a pointer to the structure of registers of the GPIOTE peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: GPIOTE instance index.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the GPIOTE peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Mask for covering port and pin bits in registers.
Symbol indicating whether GPIOTE interrupt groups are present.
Symbol indicating which interrupt group to use. Empty if there are no groups.
Symbol indicating a TrustZone suffix added to the register name.
Symbol indicating a name of PORT event register to be used.
Symbol specifying interrupt bitmask associated with the PORT event.
Symbol specifying bitmask collecting all IN events interrupts.
Initial output value for the GPIOTE channel.
Function for activating the specified GPIOTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified GPIOTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the state of the specified GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event.
The event is set.
The event is not set.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the specified GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_gpiote_int_t values for bit masking.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_gpiote_int_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_gpiote_int_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling interrupts in the specified group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be enabled.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_gpiote_int_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling interrupts in the specified group.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be disabled.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_gpiote_int_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified interrupts from a given group are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be checked.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_gpiote_int_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given GPIOTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given GPIOTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the publish configuration for a given GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling a GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling a GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_GPIOTE_Type *p_reg, uint32_t idx, uint32_t pin, nrf_gpiote_polarity_t polarity)
memberdef.name: nrf_gpiote_event_configure

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring a GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.
Pin associated with event.
Transition that should generate an event.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the pin associated with a GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the polarity associated with a GPIOTE event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling a GPIOTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling a GPIOTE task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.

memberdef.name: nrf_gpiote_task_configure

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring a GPIOTE task.

simplesect.para: Function is not configuring mode field so task is disabled after this function is called.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.
Pin associated with event.
Transition that should generate an event.
Initial value of the pin.

briefdescription.para: Function for forcing the specified state on the pin connected to GPIOTE.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.
Pin state.

briefdescription.para: Function for resetting a GPIOTE task event configuration to the default state.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if particular Task-Event is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task-Event index.
The Task-Event mode is set to Task or Event.
The Task-Event mode is set to Disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the OUT task associated with the specified GPIOTE channel.

parameterdescription.para: Channel index.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the SET task associated with the specified GPIOTE channel.

parameterdescription.para: Channel index.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the CLR task associated with the specified GPIOTE channel.

parameterdescription.para: Channel index.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the IN event associated with the specified GPIOTE channel.

parameterdescription.para: Channel index.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the latency setting.

simplesect.para: Available for event mode with rising or falling edge detection on the pin. Toggle task mode can only be used with low latency setting.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Latency setting to be set.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the latency setting.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
